root.SQL:
select * from ZBBIZ.ZBGUARANTHIS WHERE ID>0 @Condition FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
AND (QUALIFICATIONCODE ='%QUALIFICATIONCODE' OR '%QUALIFICATIONCODE'='') AND (OWNERID ='%OWNERID' OR '%OWNERID'='') AND (CMP.FULLNAME LIKE '%%FULLNAME%' OR '%FULLNAME'='') AND ID=%ID

select * from ZBBIZ.ZBGUARANMEMBERS fetch first 10 rows only for read only
AND (QUALIFICATIONCODE ='%QUALIFICATIONCODE' OR '%QUALIFICATIONCODE'='') AND (OWNERID ='%OWNERID' OR '%OWNERID'='') AND (CMP.FULLNAME LIKE '%%FULLNAME%' OR '%FULLNAME'='') AND ID=%ID
